# Heatmap Pie

```{r}
library(ggalign)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
ggheatmap(matrix(runif(360L), nrow = 20L), filling = NULL) +
    geom_pie(aes(angle = value * 360, fill = value))
```

For more complex customizations of pie charts, you can try using `ggforce::geom_arc_bar()` instead.
